mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms(u_no, r_name, r_desc, r_date_from, r_date_to, r_price, r_addr_main, r_addr_detail, r_guests, r_bath, r_bedroom, r_bed, r_checkin, r_checkout, r_gu) VALUES(#{u_no}, #{r_name}, #{r_desc}, #{r_date_from}, #{r_date_to}, #{r_price}, #{r_addr_main}, #{r_addr_detail}, #{r_guests}, #{r_bath}, #{r_bedroom}, #{r_bed}, #{r_checkin}, #{r_checkout}, #{r_gu})
